txt.en: By examining the charred wood you brought her, Ruidhriel has discovered that a great battle took place upon the Burnt Tor.
You can no longer use the vial
You can no longer use the vial

'The burning of the Tor was the work of someone very powerful. If the Company was so pressed that they were forced to set such a blaze there will surely be other signs of the battle left upon the hilltop.\n\n'Go and search for these signs and attempt to cover them as best you can. Be careful, [placeholder], for I am sure that the threat of danger has not yet passed, and evil may yet lurk in the shadows of the Burnt Tor.'
The remains of the battle are scattered across the Burnt Tor, west of Ruidhriel.\n\nRuidhriel has asked you to find any remains of the battle that occurred upon the Burnt Tor and hide them.
'These are strange tokens, [placeholder]! I will keep them safe and deliver them to Master Elrond. He may be able to read the signs more clearly than I.'
'Speak nothing of what you have found upon the Burnt Tor, [placeholder].'
'Have you found the remains of the battle upon the Burnt Tor?'
'Speak nothing of what you have found on the Burnt Tor [placeholder].'
